system.effect: Messiah: Static Signer: Rapid Action Messiah Effect: When you take Paragon, choose either Body, Mind or Spirit. You gain +2 to all Skill Checks made with Skills under that group. Signer Effect: You instead choose one of these Skill Groups, and gain a +1 bonus to this all Skill Checks under this category. This lasts until the end of the Scene. You may choose a different Skill Group each time you activate Paragon.
